processed_by.processor: Cui, Hong using Text2XML java application init commit r86, validated against beeSchema.xsd revision f0a80a8516a06e51224d01314403eb26d60f881d

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species folioflorus;

treatment.description: Strongly suggesting no. 44 but with primocane-leaflets more gradually attenuate to the acumination, their margins less lobulate and teeth more numerous; terminal leaflet deeply cordate, round-ovate, lateral leaflets as broad as long; bracteal leaves greatly overtopping the short (up to 2 cm. long) pedicels.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Dry sand or gravel, se. Minn.
